thought: The workflow is fully implemented as requested: it triggers manually, reads commercial entries from Google Sheets, classifies each Description using AI, and sends individual emails via Gmail with classification results. The Gmail action parameters are explicitly set to avoid type issues. The workflow has been tested and runs successfully sending emails with expected content.
plan: Submit the completed workflow to the user.
Explain the workflow steps and how it meets the requirements.
Invite user feedback for any further improvements.
criticism: The workflow could be further improved with concurrency for faster email sending or enhanced error handling, but it meets the current requirements well.
